summary: Tired of the old, ugly Blue Palace courtyard? Let's revamp!
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]I hated going to and from the Blue Palace and seeing how ugly and unkempt it was, so I fixed it up a bit.

[/size]*FROM MY OLD ACCOUNT: crashqueenxx

[size=3]What I've Changed:[/size]

[size=3](1.0)[/size]
-Tables, chairs, food, wine, benches added to around the courtyard.
-Done from scratch to prevent any more bugs, they should be all fixed.

[size=3][u]IN VERSION 1.2:[/u][/size]
I will redo the outer platforms and such to the exterior of the courtyard.

[size=4]UPCOMING PROJECTS:[/size]
*Better-looking Male Marriage Candidates.
*Improved Dragonsreach Courtyard.

[size=4]*INCOMPATIBLE WITH ANYTHING THAT EDITS THE BLUE PALACE EXTERIOR, with exceptions to textures like Sexy Solitude. (This includes: JK's Solitude, Towns and Villages Enhanced, Extended Towns and Cities [If I'm not mistaken, you can delete the Solitude file of this mod in your directory], ETC.)  [/size]

***This is my very first mod (yay me), so I INSIST that you message me with ANY bugs, critique or suggestions.*** 

-LadyTyrell
author: LadyTyrell
